domain.name: Multimedia Franchise
domain.description: Franchises which span multiple forms of media like 'Harry Potter'

entity.name: Pokémon
entity.description: This entity includes all conversation about the franchise, as well as any individual installments in the series, if applicable. **NOTE: Annotations redirected to domain 130 ONLY on 8/7/18.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text: @purplemage572 @FbrAndrew @Pokemon Because all Pokémon were coded into those games. Now we have Pokémon we can only stare at and see how useless they are in an app.
